description: This CSS file contains styles for a React application, including variables for theme management, responsive design elements, and styles for the main application components.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main styling for the App component, including layout and color settings based on theme.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styling for the header section of the App, defining layout, background color, and typography.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styling for the links within the App, defining color and transition effects.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styling for the theme toggle button, including positioning, background color, and hover effects.
